content: Everyone, brace yourself! The revelations of recent research have created a buzz in the world of love and relationships. title: Supreme Court says girls 'sex life' no cause for bail in the rape case.
content:
Furthering its consistently strong stand against sexual violence, the Supreme Court on Friday said medical evidence suggesting a victim of sexual assault is "habituated to sex" was no ground for a high court to grant bail to an accused in a rape case.

title: Sleeping Next To Someone Who Snores Is Bad For Your Mental Health: Study Says
content:
Living with a partner is a great feeling, but it doesn't feel so great if you are a light sleeper and your partner is a snorer. In fact, it can cause mental illness and dampen your relationship with the real bad.

title: Moments that occur only in the first two months of marriage.
content: No matter how long a courtship period you had with your partner before marriage or the number of years you have dated your lover, life takes a turn once you get married. title: Things that will make your break-up less painful
content: Dealing with a break-up is one of the hardest battles we fight with ourselves. The person you loved (or still love) is no longer a part of your life and now, the road ahead looms to be an endless emotional struggle. It is surely not an easy phase but with the right thinking and pragmatic approach

title: All 4 accused in Hyderabad veterinarianâ€™s rape and murder case killed in a police encounter
content:
Police have said all four accused in the rape and murder of the Hyderabad vet have been killed in an encounter. The accused were shot dead on the same highway where the body of the 26-year-old was found.

title: Supreme Court Dismisses All Review Petition Against Ayodhya Verdict in Favour of Ram Temple
content: The Supreme Court on Thursday dismissed all the review petitions challenging a Constitution Bench's order in the Ayodhya case that had cleared the way for construction of a Ram Temple at the disputed site. title: Top Places to Visit in Daman district, India
content: Daman district is one of the three districts of the union territory of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu on the western coast of India, surrounded by the Valsad District of Gujarat state on the north, east and south and the Arabian Sea to the west. title: Top Places to Visit in Diu district, India
content: Diu District is one of the three districts of the union territory of Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu of India.  The district is made up of Diu Island and two small enclaves on the Indian mainland. title: Beetroot milk Recipe, Rose milk using Beetroots
content:
Delicious rose milk made using beetroots. This is healthy for kids and toddlers. Instead of giving normal rose milk with lots of food coloring, you can give this beet milk.
